name: BananoPult
description:
BananoPult is a banano themed arcade game. Launch the monkey and collect as many banano as you can. 

You can  download and install the Android version. There is not WebGL version yet, it does not compile correct.  

This game is still a work in progress, but I wanted to give you a taste already. There is still lots to be done: graphics, sound fx, particles, ban leaderboard, and hopefully real ban payouts :) 

If you have any comments or feedback you can contact me at /u/senzuboon. Thanks for checking it out! And enjoy the game!

Want to donate some ban?
